name: mycli-app
description: This project does  A] viewing(flat view or tree view): of the content of any folderPath entered B] organising classifies all the content files within a folder (whose path is entered by the user) into 6 categories : media,archives,documents,app,images,others making their copies in a folder called organizedFolder C] The help menu guides the user about what she is doing wrong, what she can do and how can she do it.
